    • Method Detail

      • login

        public Response login(Context context,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Tries to log in user using given username and password
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        username - Users name
        password - SHA-1 hashed password
        Returns:
        Response object with a token
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - logged in
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - user not found
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - incorrect password

      • signToFlat

        public Response signToFlat(Context context,
                           int userID,
                           int flatID,
                           java.lang.String flatPassword)
        Signs user to given flat
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        userID - ID of user
        flatID - ID of a flat to join
        flatPassword - SHA-1 hashed flat password
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - signed
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - incorrect password
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • signOut

        public Response signOut(Context context,
                        int userID,
                        int flatID)
        Deletes user's assignment to a flat
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        userID - ID of user to move out
        flatID - ID of a flat to be moved out from
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - signed out
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - user was not signed to this flat
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • getUserID

        public Response getUserID(Context context,
                          java.lang.String username)
        Retrieves user's ID when given name
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        username - Name of a user
        Returns:
        Response object with ID (int)
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - username not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • getUser

        public Response getUser(Context context,
                        int userID)
        Retrieves name of given user
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        userID - ID of a user
        Returns:
        Response object with user name
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - retrieved
        - MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND - user not found
        - MESSAGE_UNAUTHORIZED - user unauthorized

      • createUser

        public Response createUser(Context context,
                           java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
        Creates user with given username and password
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        username - New username
        password - Password
        Returns:
        Response object with userName
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - created
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - incorrect name or already in use

      • changePassword

        public Response changePassword(Context context,
                               int userID,
                               java.lang.String oldPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPassword)
        Parameters:
        context - Current context
        userID - ID of user to change password
        oldPassword - Old password
        newPassword - New password
        Returns:
        Response object
        ErrorCodes:
        - MESSAGE_OK - changed
        - MESSAGE_FORBIDDEN - incorrect password
